CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable cameras
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables all cameras on the device. When cameras are disabled, no applications running will be able to access any cameras on the device

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Encrypt device
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Starts the encryption wizard if device is not encrypted

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Notify of unsecured access points
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Notify user when device connects to unsecured access points

ListPreference.android:title: Set maximum lock screen timeout
ListPreference.android:summary: Sets maximum length of time since the user last touched the screen or pressed a button before the device locks the screen

ListPreference.android:title: Set maximum failed password attempts
ListPreference.android:summary: Specifies how many times a user can enter the wrong password before the device wipes its data
